name: Digital Blasphemy Widget
author: Topher

sections.description:
Digital Blasphemy ( at http://digitalblasphemy.com/ ) is a great desktop wallpaper site.

There are always about 50 free wallpapers available. This WordPress widget allows you to show thumbnails of the free wallpapers.

You can choose to show a single random thumbnail from the pool, or the latest freebie.

Usage

Some basic CSS is included. If you’d like to turn it off, drop this code into your theme functions.php file or a plugin of your choosing.

function db_styles() {
    return false;
}
add_filter( 'digitalblasphemy-styles', 'db_styles' );
sections.installation:
1. Upload the /digital-blasphemy-widget/ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit Appearance -> Widgets in the admin and place the widget in a sidebar
sections.changelog:
1.3

Tested against WP 4.0

1.2

Code cleanup, testing, fixed bug where plugin wouldn’t activate

1.1

Code cleanup, data validation etc. No new functionality.

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Allows you to render a random or latest Freebie image from Digital Blasphemy.
